errors.error_description: The 'Step by step' instructions have an incorrect logical order. It instructs the user to run the script (Step 2) before opening the RFEM 6 application (Step 4), which will cause a connection failure.
correction_candidates: Swap the order of Step 2 ('Run your script') and Step 4 ('Open RFEM 6 application'). The RFEM application must be running before the script.
Combine Step 2 and Step 4 into a single step: 'Open RFEM 6 and then run your script'.
Move 'Run your script' to be the last step in the list.
Move 'Open RFEM 6 application' to be the first step, before cloning the repository.
errors.golden_answer: Swap the order of Step 2 ('Run your script') and Step 4 ('Open RFEM 6 application'). The RFEM application must be running before the script.
